page.title: 19QUARNDON:RECREATION
page.content: THE FOCAL POINT FOR GUIDES, SCOUTS WOMEN'S INSTITUTE,AUTUMN LEAVES,PLAYSCHOOL, IS THE CHURCH HALL. THIS IS WELL-USED FOR REGULAR AND OCCASIONAL FUNCTIONS. THERE IS A STAGE SO DRAMATIC EVENTS CAN TAKE PLACE.BOTH THE CRICKET CLUB AND KEDLESTON GOLF CLUB ARE POPULAR PLACES. PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE CARRY OUT A WIDE VARIETY OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES FROM GARDENING TO AN INTEREST IN HEDGEHOGS. THE CRICKET CLUB IS AN IMPORTANT PART OF VILLAGE LIFE. THE TEAM WON A NATIONAL COMPETITION, THE WHITBREAD CHAMPIONSHIPS, IN 1983. ARTS AND CRAFTS:A WIDE VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES FROM SPINNING AND WEAVING TO POTTERY AND PAINTING. THERE IS AN ANNUAL FETE (SEE PHOTO D)
